The R package `bridge` contains different tools used by the FRB-CESAB Project 
Bridge to work with connectivity matrix and Moran Eigenvalue Maps.



## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("frbcesab/bridge")
```

Then you can attach the package `bridge`:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library("bridge")
```



## Get started

Please read the [Get started](https://frbcesab.github.io/bridge/articles/bridge.html)
vignette.
